thread.title: Re: Liberals ATTACK ‘mafia wife’ Melania Trump for reciting Lord’s Prayer
thread.title_full: Re: Liberals ATTACK ‘mafia wife’ Melania Trump for reciting Lord’s Prayer

author: Rush2112
title: Re: Liberals ATTACK ‘mafia wife’ Melania Trump for reciting Lord’s Prayer
text:
Some even questioned her faith because she read the prayer and didn’t have it memorized: This does seem disingenuous. 
Never seen someone read the Lord's Prayer before. Most Christians know it by heart by like 4th grade. https://t.co/cPP7Z38WvA 
— Patrick Thornton (@pwthornton) February 19, 2017 1) she’s obviously never said these words before ever 
2) I love this prayer but it is not appropriate at a political rally whatsoever https://t.co/ZT5dgL24Xh 
— Heidi N Moore (@moorehn) February 19, 2017 Just tweeted same thing! First time speaking those words. https://t.co/jC220yDnVS 
— Anushay Hossain (@AnushayHossain) February 19, 2017 
Amateur body-language experts went to work as well, claiming the video is evidence that Melania doesn’t like the president very much: Literally even the slightest touch by that garbage monster makes her flinch pic.twitter.com/iCLTRbKvdj 
— Jess Dweck (@TheDweck) February 19, 2017 I believe FLOTUS hates POTUS, but she does the "flinch" several times without him touching here in this. @TheDweck https://t.co/lbfGTFqjiA 
— Cody Johnston (@drmistercody) February 19, 2017 If this is unedited video footage, that’s the loudest non-verbal communication I’ve heard in a while. Wow. Yikes. https://t.co/hbGreZmzV5 
— Chrysippus Pirillo (@ChrisPirillo) February 19, 2017 
But she’s not a victim, according to Hollywood writer-producer Geoff Thorne: stop pretending she's anywhere near being a victim. she's a mafia wife. she made her deal. https://t.co/XaAkoPRc0P 
— Game of Thornes (@GeoffThorne) February 19, 2017 
And Joy Reid was concerned with the signs in the background that said, “Blacks for Trump 2020”: So this happened today (and the religious right went crazy for it. They loved it!) The other viral aspect? The signs behind Melania Trump… https://t.co/D6Rbc4Ys3a 
— Joy Reid (@JoyAnnReid) February 19, 2017 
***
